author: Cory Stieg
title: Former monk Jay Shetty on how to remain calm, happy and present during COVID-19 pandemic
description: Jay Shetty, podcast host and storyteller, was a monk for three years. Here are habits he suggests to can help you feel calmer and happier amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
During uncertain times, it's normal to feel anxious. 
"Whenever there's any major change that happens in our life, we naturally experience uncertainty, or unease, or anxiety or pain," Jay Shetty tells CNBC Make It.
